name: Work Like Hell
description:
As employee's of hell that has been mismanaged and underappreciated, fight back the tyranny and hold of the attack for 10 minutes! Try out the fast-paced bubble shooter which was highly inspired by Dynomite Deluxe by Popcap Games !

Controls

Mouse/Keyboard

  • Left Click - Fire Bubbles
  • E - Use ability
  • W/S - Navigate ability

Screenshots

Some game play screenshot Using Shotgun ability Combo activated. And new ability unlocked

Thanks to those who are trying out this game. The WebGL version will require some work as there are some game breaking issues.

Known Issues:

  • Orb floating in the mid air
  • Orb infinitely bouncing back and forth
  • Breaking sounds when played multiple time. eg; shotgun ability
